overview: When life is too much, when I can't see what's in front of me, when the world feels like it's about to end, I think. As I lay dying.  "As I Lay Dying" (내가 죽어 누워 있을 때, Naega Jugeo Nuwo Isseul Ttae) A woman lies in her own funeral and listens to the conversations from people who come to visit her.  "What's Easy For You Is Hard For Me" (너한테 쉽고 나한테는 참 어려운 것, Neohante Swipgo Nahanteneun Cham Eoryeoun Geot) Twenty-nine year old 'Mugunghwa' and 'Two Sisters' who are turning thirty soon want remain meaningful who won't be forgotten by anyone.
title: As I Lay Dying
